description:
Genexi is a global biotech accelerator founded to create a thriving ecosystem for pharmaceutical companies, researchers, biotech entrepreneurs and the public.

The structure of  business includes an electronic marketplace for the sale of biotech and pharmaceutical goods, which incorporates blockchain-based product tracking and reporting system, and a biotech foundation which is going to provide grants to support under-resourced biotech projects and entrepreneurs, together with their subsequent launch and distribution within their e-commerce platform. Genexi will engineer biotech startup success and get a desired product to customers’hands safer and faster by providing both funds and expertise to most promising projects in the field, with their scaling within their effective and global marketplace.
name: Genexi
